mapper.update: update bi_request set cus_no = #{customer.no}, req_category_name = #{categoryName}, req_suggest = #{suggest}, req_handle = #{handle}, req_receive_date = #{receiveDate}, req_start_date = #{startDate}, req_end_date = #{endDate}, req_close_date = #{closeDate}, req_flag = #{flag}, req_msg = #{msg} where req_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into bi_request (req_no, cus_no, pjt_no, emp_id, req_category_name, req_suggest, req_handle, req_receive_date, req_start_date, req_end_date, req_close_date, req_flag, req_msg) values (#{no}, #{customer.no}, #{project.no}, #{emp.id}, #{categoryName}, #{suggest}, #{handle}, #{receiveDate}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{closeDate}, #{flag}, #{msg})
mapper.select: select req_no, cus_no, pjt_no, emp_id, req_category_name, req_suggest, req_handle, req_receive_date, req_start_date, req_end_date, req_close_date, req_flag, req_msg from bi_request where req_no = #{value}

select count(*) from bi_request R, bi_project P, bi_company C where R.pjt_no = P.pjt_no and P.com_no = C.com_no
and R.req_category_name = #{categoryName}
and C.com_name like '%' || #{companyName} || '%'
and R.req_flag = #{flag}
and R.req_flag != 'N'
and R.req_suggest like '%' || #{suggest} || '%'
and R.req_receive_date >= to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.req_receive_date <= to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and R.req_start_date >= to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.req_start_date <= to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and R.req_end_date >= to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.req_end_date <= to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and R.req_close_date >= to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.req_close_date <= to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')

select req_no, cus_no, pjt_no, emp_id, req_category_name, req_suggest, req_handle, req_receive_date, req_start_date, req_end_date, req_close_date, req_flag, req_msg from ( select R.req_no, R.cus_no, R.pjt_no, R.emp_id, R.req_category_name, R.req_suggest, R.req_handle, R.req_receive_date, R.req_start_date, R.req_end_date, R.req_close_date, R.req_flag, R.req_msg, row_number() over (order by req_no desc) rn from bi_request R, bi_project P, bi_company C where R.pjt_no = P.pjt_no and P.com_no = C.com_no
and R.req_category_name = #{categoryName}
and C.com_name like '%' || #{companyName} || '%'
and R.req_flag = #{flag}
and R.req_flag != 'N'
and R.req_suggest like '%' || #{suggest} || '%'
and R.req_receive_date >= to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.req_receive_date <= to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and R.req_start_date >= to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.req_start_date <= to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and R.req_end_date >= to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.req_end_date <= to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and R.req_close_date >= to_date(#{fromDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.req_close_date <= to_date(#{toDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn <= #{endIndex} order by req_no desc
